16년도 6월에 출시된 신작게임 데드 바이 데이라이트.
기존의 술래잡기+깡통차기 게임을 공포스러운 분위기로 변환시킨 게임으로써 진입장벽이 높지않고 게임자체가 루즈해지지 않게 계속 흥미진진해지며 이볼브처럼 1vs4 구조로 싸우는 형식이 아닌 살인마에게 도망가야되는 생존자 시스템이라 톰과제리를 연상시키기도 합니다.

제가 게임을 하면서 양심에 찔린다는 느낌을 처음 느껴봣는데.. 갈고리에 걸린 저를 구하려고 왔다가 대신 걸리고 전 도망가야할때라든지...등..

2만1천원 돈으로 이정도 퀄리티,게임이면 확실히 좋습니다. 100% 추천드리는 바구요.
다만 권장사양이 꽤나 높은편이고 자잘한 버그들이 아직 많아 완벽함을 추구하시는 분들은 조금 불편하실수도 있습니다.

저로썬 상당히 재밌게 즐기는 중입니다. 모두 재밌는 데바데 하시길 바랍니다.

Thinking of buying a great stealth game that has horror elements? A game that gives you that sickening feeling of dread by being hunted? The satisfying feeling of locking onto your prey and tearing into them as they run in fear? Well this sure as hell isn't that game. I've played quite a lot of DBD, and I have to say I think the Developers are playing their own torture scenario on the players. Survivors are basically able to run circles around the killers, while the killers are able to do pratcically nothing about it. I've literally had 4 survivors just continue to run at me while I knock one down I chase another then they go pick up their friend and do it all again. Thinking of hooking a survivor? Well while one of them is off turning on the generators you're chasing one and then the third gets the person off the hook. I thought it was bad before, but now they nerfed the only killer that still had a chance. Literally no one wants to even play the killers anymore because it's not you taunting them, it's them hunting you. If you have 4 decent survivors you cannot win as a killer. It's a fact, I don't care who you are or how good you are, it's not going to be done. Not only that, my survivor who is level 25 has 2 ultra rare perks, while my killer who is 36 is still unlocking common perks. It's broken, heed my warning do not buy this, ever. Don't listen to the devs because they are deaf in the ears.

Dead by daylight is an amazing game, encourages team work between 4 survivors to try and escape the grasp of a killer who needs to sacrafice them to an entity. Great game with benefits to playing both Survivor and Killer, has a fairly high skill cap so requires a bit of time to learn the maps, spots and counter play to different killers and perks.

10/10 would spend money again

Изначально было интересно играть, но со временем разработчики убили игру: прибавили убийцам скорость хотьбы, запретили перепрыгивать через окна более 3х раз, занерфили навыки выживших в гов но, сократили количество досок и места для манса, сделали респавн сломанных крюков - все это позволяет убийце не напрягаясь перебить всю команду с фулл прокачкой. желание играть с друзьями пропало. еще и античит починить не могут, так что готовтесь к встрече с читером каждую третью игру

This game is the only game in a looooong while that has made me feel excited to play. I can play it for hours and still im not getting bored. With or without friends it is alot of fun, like mostly you can have fun playing as a survivor with your friends and then again if you feel like you dont want peoples company you just become killer and start hunting for others! Developers listen to the community which is really nice of them, they see what people think and then do what they think is the best. They also give out stuff!! for free!! Unfortunately i did not get to go to PAX from all the way from Finland, but anyway, we got the first DLC for free!! And now we got amazing clothes as an really cheap dlc, which you dont need to buy if you dont want. Well long story short; I will highly recommend this game! Thanks for the game Developers!

Let me start off by saying that english isn't my first language, so bear with me..
But i have been playing dead by daylight for 2 months aproximately, and there are some cons with the game but it's not that big of a deal, but the game is set, in 4 different locations, we have 4 survivors, whose job is to survive, and finish generators located all over the map, 5 generators need to be activated, in order to open the main door, letting you out. And the killers job is to kill the survivors obviously, trying to stop the survivors from activating the generators and escape, it takes 2 hits, before a survivor get into a dying state, the killer can then choose to let them bleed to dead on the ground, or the most common, pick the survivor up, find a nearby hook, and place the survivor onto it, that is the quickest way to finish them off, the survivors can unhook them, or mind their own business. I have to mention that the survivors and the killers point of view, are different, from the surviors perspective, you see the world in third person, which allows you to see more, and have a larger view over the map, the killer on the other hand, see the map through first person, which has its limits, but you do have advantages as well, like if the survivors choose to run away, they leave footprint on the map, which the killer eventually can track you down, and whenever the survivors do something out loud, when failing to activate the generators, the killer sees where it happended and by then, the survivors gave themselves away... 

I personally loved the game :) It's so fun being survivor, trying to make your way out of the place, it really draws you in, and can make leaving the computer hard to do so, the atmosphere is great, and i think it's all put very well together, and the music almost takes the show, like when the killer is approaching you get to hear his heartbeat, and the closer he is, the harder the heartbeat gets, the more panic creates. Really fun game, the only bad things is the lobby, when preparing for a match, sometimes you simply can't access a lobby, and it takes a really long time to just start up one match, and the mechanics sometimes get confusing, but it's just been realesed and the game makers are hustling to get it going. 9/10

When I first bought this game I was really into it. The devs seemed awesome, they were updating all the time. After a while I realized they really didn't care all that much as most of the updates didn't fix any of the real problems. It took them a really long time to fix the issue where you would get stuck in the ground randomly.

My major issue with them right now is that they claimed there would be no micro-transactions. Now what are there? Micro-transactions. Just great devs. Way to show that you really care. 

Now that some time has passed, I am still upset about micro Transactions. The devs don't seem to care about the super toxic community they have and body blocking killers is a HUGE problem. With all that being said I do enjoy the game, when I can a full lobby in less than 5 minutes (which rarely ever happens).
As much as you hate this game at times, it is still really fun and replayable a lot.

EL JUEGO SIGUE SIENDO UNA BOSTA AHORA MEJORARON LOS MAPITAS Y MUY LINDO PERO SIGUE TODO BUGEADO Y NI TE CUENTO EL HIT BOX AAAHHH MAMITA Y PARA COLMO PONEN UN SEASON PASS NUEVO  AJAJAJAJ ESTA RE LOQUITOS ESTOS YANKES DEL CULO

Okay, so I don't know how best to describe this.  The first 5 hours are very frustrating where you will die almost every match immeditely, hour 6 you learn not to run like an idiot when the killer proximity music kicks on and actually start getting some points and having fun.  Hour 10 you realize how bad of a grind the leveling system is.  Hour 11 you read it takes around 100 hours to max a character.  Hour 15 you start actually being able to escape consistently and raising your rank though youll still never get it past 18 because of the perks, hour 20 you start questioning the match making system and why they pair a bunch of non leveled characters against maxed out killers.... Hour 25 you finally accept the game for what it is... realizing that despite not really knowing if you would call it a "good game," you keep wanting to play, are watching dev blogs, and excited to see what is coming. 

The game seems like it should still be in early access, but being that its only around 20 bucks, its worth picking up.  Every system works so far, but it still needs fixes to match making (campfire simulator 2016), and glitches (sometimes throwing a palet will teleport you on the wrong side right in front of the killer.  But I have confidence they will fix it. 

You can get incredibly frustrated with this game, and at the same time have a lot of fun, but either way you will want to pick it up.  I only play pick up groups, but if you also have friends that play it would be a no brainer.  

50 bucks, I would say prob not, at 20 bucks, definitely pick it up!  You see people pumping hundreds of hours into it so you know there is something special about it, and at 100 hours, you cant deny that .20 cents / hour is good value.

Edit:  

The new matchmaking system works great.  It will keep continuously searching until a match is found.... very very big improvement.

I originally heard about Dead By Daylight through a streamer I watch on youtube. Watching her play, I was immediately intrigued by the gameplay. I finally bought it, and I have never been happier with a game, especially for the price. I could literally play this game for hours if my hands could handle it. It is so addicting, and scary, and fun all at the same time! I really love that the makers of the game are always trying to work on the game to make it better. It has come a long way from when I first started playing, and I cant wait to see where it goes next. I would highly recommend this to anyone who loves 1st person /horror/ survival games. The best part of the game is that you can play with friends! It makes it a ton of fun, especially when youre playing as the killer against them. Each month the ranks reset, that way you have an incentive to keep playing. You never get tired of this game! The only bad thing about this game that they havent fixed yet, is if someone decides to leave the lobby/match, you have no way to report it, at least that I know of currently. Other than that one thing, this is one of the best games out there for PC!!

Aufgrund des Halloween DLC muss ich leider meine Review abändern:
Der neue Killer - Michael Myers - ist viel zu stark und als überlebender hat man kaum eine Chance. Gefühlt ist jdes Match als Surviver gegen Michael Myers und so steigt das Frustrationslevel relativ schnell... Seit dem DLC ist das Balancing dahin da der Killer, von Anfang an, Fähigkeitn hat die andere Killer nur durch Perks erhalten.

Wenn man davon absieht das das Matchmaking teilweise so lange dauert, dass man bequem nebenbei seine Wäsche aufhängen könnte, wenn man nicht dauernd (ca. ein mal in der Minute) "Bereit" klicken müsste. Das sorgt relativ schnell für Frustration und sollte dringend vom Entwickler verbessert werden.

Ansonsten, ein super Spiel das fordernd aber auch witzig ist, vorallem wenn man es mit Freunden Spielt. 
Es mag sein das es nur mir so vorkommt, aber gefühlt spielt sich jeder der Überlebenden etwas anders und hat seine eigenen Stärken. 
Die Killer haben alle ihre eigenen Stärken und schwächen und unterscheiden sich massiv, in der Spielweise, von einander, jedoch ist das ganze gut ausbalanciert und man kann theoretisch jedem hoch gelevelten Killer entkommen, wenn man sich geschickter anstellt als ich. 
Das Skillsystem ist sehr gut geraten und in den höheren Leveln muss man teilweise genau überlegen welchen Skill man sich zuerst gönnt, da es sein kann das der nächste damit unerreichbar wird.
Wie in allen Multiplayer Spielen ist es von vorteil wenn man sich mit seinen Mitstreitern, z.B. via TS, absprechen kann.

Игра с самого начала зацепила, но прошло уже месяца 3, а баги с атакой до сих пор остались. Хоть я и имею 1-ые ранги на маньяке и выжившем, но уже изрядно за_ебало, когда играя за маньяка, пытаешься ударить выжевшего, а вместо удара или длинного удара, эта сука делает быстрый удар в препятствие, т.к. какой-то ебаный пиксель был рядом, даже если перед тобой стоит выживший, ты все-равно бьешь в стену или что рядом стояло. Так же часто бывает, когда делаешь удар, а удар просто сквозь выжевшего проходит, что вводит меня в дикий рейж. Идея хорошая, часто играл в удовольствие, но дико выбешивают баги. Удаляю, ибо релиз уже вышел давно, а БАГИ, СУКА, НЕ ИСПРАВИЛИ!

A cat and mouse game in which survivors complain about killers being op, and killers complain about survivors being op, while the good players watches from the side, collecting salt for their popcorn.

Really fun 1 v 4 game with suprising complexity and depth.  While the premise is simple, the tactics for both surviors and killers are fun to explore and employ. Genuinely innovate gameplay and very active devs constantly improving and updating.

Mit dem Update 1.1.2 hatte ich große Hoffnung, dass das Matchmaking System "Survive with friends" endlich gefixt wurde. Ich spiele nun mal ungern alleine und habe immer einen Kumpel dabei, der mitspielt.  Fürn Arsch. Das Matchmaking ist sogar noch schlechter geworden. Bevor jetzt angezeigt wird, dass keine Spiele gefunden wurden, fliegt man zurück auf den Startbildschirm des Spiels. Absoluter Müll. 
Spielprinzip ist top. Wenn man mal ein Spiel gefunden hat, macht es richtig Spaß. Es ist aber absolut unspielbar, wenn man mit Freunden nach einem Match sucht.

E magari molti più killer, 4 sono pochi, anche se per skillarli tutti ci vogliono almeno 60 ore credo. Grafica invece da 8 per essere un multiplayer.
